endpoints.description: Send an encrypted message to a specified recipient.
Retrieve all encrypted messages received by the authenticated user.
Send a reply to a received encrypted message.
Fetch the status (delivered, read) of a specific sent message.
Initiate an encrypted voice or video call with another user.
View the call history of the authenticated user.
Generate and store encryption keys for secure communication.
Retrieve the current privacy and app settings of the authenticated user.
Create a new group for secure messaging and calling.
Add new members to an existing communication group.
